oai_dc:dc.dc:title: NDICEA nitrogen planner
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: van der Burgt, G.J.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Composting and manuring
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The program NDICEA nitrogen planner presents an integrated assessment on the question of nitrogen availability for your crops. This is more than a simple nitrogen budgeting for each crop: crop demand on one side, and expected availability out of artificial fertilizers and manures, crop residues, green manures and soil on the other side.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: van der Burgt, G.J. (2005) NDICEA nitrogen planner. Louis Bolk Instituut.
